Key Arguments: The legislation infringes on freedom of expression.
The complexity of content exemptions could lead to confusion and inconsistency.
The scope of the private message exemption needs further clarification.
The size of penalties could discourage innovation and have a chilling effect on digital platforms.
Main Themes: Complexity and clarity of legal provisions
Impact on innovation and digital platforms
Notable Quotes: The proposed legislation, as it stands, appears to infringe upon the freedom of expression.
It is crucial to strike a balance between addressing harmful content and protecting the right to express oneself freely.
The bill proposes substantial penalties for non-compliance, which could have a chilling effect on digital platform services and discourage innovation.
